home.title: The future of farming is here.
home.content: From skilled labour to vehicle rental, we have everything you need to make your farm a success.

offer.title: What we offer
offer.content: We offer skilled labour, vehicle rental and a marketplace for all your farming needs.

why.title: Why FarmEase?
why.content: We're transforming agriculture with innovative solutions that help farmers thrive in today's changing landscape.
why.benefit1-content: Our skilled labour and marketplace help you get the most out of your farm.
why.benefit2-content: Our vehicle rental and marketplace help you save time and money.
why.benefit3-content: Our weather forecast and marketplace help you reduce risk and make better decisions.
why.benefit4-content: Automate manual processes and streamline your operations.

values.title: Our values
values.content: We believe in the power of technology to transform agriculture and make it more sustainable.
values.value1-content: We're committed to helping farmers succeed by providing the tools, knowledge, and support they need to grow their business sustainably.
values.value2-content: We're building a more resilient and sustainable food system for a healthier planet and  a brighter future for  generations to come.
values.value3-content: We're driving progress in agriculture through cutting-edge technology, data-driven insights, and forward-thinking solutions.
values.value4-content: We believe in the power of collaboration and are dedicated to working with our customers and partners to co-create and deliver value.
values.value5-content: We're passionate about solving real-world problems and are focused on delivering solutions that meet the needs of our customers and drive meaningful impact.
values.value6-content: We're committed to delivering reliable, high-quality products and services that our customers can trust  to help them run their operations more efficiently, safely, and sustainably.

categories.title: What do you want to rent?

steps.title: How it works
steps.content: It's easy to get started with FarmEase. Just follow these simple steps.
steps.step1-content: Create an account and tell us about your farm.
steps.step2-content: Browse our rentals, and find the perfect equipment for your farm.
steps.step3-content: Rent the equipment you need and get it delivered to your farm.
steps.step4-content: Register the equipment and review the condition.
steps.step5-content: Make the payment and start using the equipment.
steps.step6-content: Use the equipment to make your farm a success.
steps.step7-content: Return the equipment when you're done. It's that easy!
steps.return-policy-content: The vehicle/equipment should be returned in the same condition it was rented out. Any damages will be charged to the renter. Please refer to our terms and conditions for more details.

help.title: Need help?
help.content: We're here to help. Our support team is available 24/7, and we're committed to providing the support you need at every step of your journey with FarmEase.
